languages.text: "Почему ты сам не убьешь Комиссара? Лазружье, знаешь ли, не только как костыль можно использовать".

traits.locale_text: "Почему ты сам не убьешь Комиссара? Лазружье, знаешь ли, не только как костыль можно использовать".

languages.text: "Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."
languages.original_text: "Почему ты сам не убьешь Комиссара? Лазружье, знаешь ли, не только как костыль можно использовать".

traits.locale_text: "Why won't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."
"Why won't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."
"Why won't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."
"Why won't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."
"Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."
"Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."

languages.text: 「自分の手でコミッサーを始末したらどうだ？ラスガンはその場しのぎの松葉杖以外の用途にも使えるんだぞ」
languages.original_text: "Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の手でコミッサーを始末したらどうだ？ラスガンはその場しのぎの松葉杖以外の用途にも使えるんだぞ」

languages.text: “你为什么不自己动手杀了政委呢？激光枪除了可以当临时拐杖之外，还有别的用途。”
languages.original_text: "Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."

traits.locale_text: “你为什么不自己动手杀了政委呢？激光枪除了可以当临时拐杖之外，还有别的用途。”

languages.text: «¿Y por qué no mata al Comisario usted mismo? Los rifles láser no solo sirven como muleta improvisada».
languages.original_text: "Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y por qué no mata al Comisario usted mismo? Los rifles láser no solo sirven como muleta improvisada».

languages.text: "Warum tötet Ihr den Kommissar nicht selbst? Lasergewehre kann man nicht nur als provisorische Krücke verwenden."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."

traits.locale_text: "Warum tötet Ihr den Kommissar nicht selbst? Lasergewehre kann man nicht nur als provisorische Krücke verwenden."

languages.text: « Pourquoi ne pas tuer le commissaire vous-même ? Les fusils laser ne servent pas uniquement de béquilles de fortune. »
languages.original_text: "Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ne pas tuer le commissaire vous-même ? Les fusils laser ne servent pas uniquement de béquilles de fortune. »

languages.text: "Komiser'i neden kendin öldürmüyorsun? Silazerler, eğreti koltuk değneklerinden farkı amaçlar için de kullanılabilir."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you kill the Commissar yourself? Lasguns can be used for purposes other than a makeshift crutch."

traits.locale_text: "Komiser'i neden kendin öldürmüyorsun? Silazerler, eğreti koltuk değneklerinden farkı amaçlar için de kullanılabilir."
